item.title: Text Analysis Dashboard
item.description: name: text_mining fullname: State Emergency Department Report description: >An automated state emergency department report template summarizing CCDD categories. Original Code By: Michael Sheppard. Adapted to the Rnssp Package by: Gbedegnon Roseric Azondekon. National Syndromic and Surveillance Program. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). create_dir: true Detailed Description The Interactive Text Analysis Dashboard template (text_mining) summarizes the chief complaint text and diagnosis codes as part of an initial description of the content of these fields in existing syndromes or categories.
